title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight -  Airbus H125 helicopter - version 1.2.2
description:
In this video we look at the latest version of Airbus H125 received after the initial beta version. Besides the graphical enhancements several new functionalities the throttling issue introduced in the latest MSFS update has been resolved.

If you also want to give this aircraft a try download your own copy from:
https://flightsim.to/file/25212/airbus-h125-helicopter-project
